title: cheezcarls
author: cheezcarls
content: Website | Platform | Tournament | X | Telegram | Facebook | Youtube | LinkedInWhat is PlayTrade.win?The ultimate destination for gaming and trading enthusiasts. Our platform combines the thrill of gaming with the excitement of trading, creating a unique and rewarding experience for our users. This is the first P2E game by the Nordek chain.You can read more about Nordek hereUPDATES: Whitepaper, audit and PTW tokenomics still not out yet and currently in the works as we're more focused in tournaments with BNB prize pool as of this time. Will keep this thread updated for the above updates mentioned and the tournament results.

comments.body: PlayTrade.win is having a free play-to-earn back to back free trading challenge #75!This event is free and open to new and existing accounts!
